name: PION
description:
A fast-paced sci-fi top-down shooter with roguelike elements. Pilot exotic hovercraft and battle your way through ancient drones and deadly defense systems to reclaim Earth. Upgrade your hovercraft by collecting powerful weapons and forgotten technology from the remnants of Earth's techno-cults.

Features as of 26/06/2017:

  • 3 Randomized levels
  • 3 Bosses
  • 21 enemy types
  • Miniboss encounters
  • 21 Different weapons
  • 4 Playable hovercraft with unique abilities
  • Steam Leaderboards integration
  • Randomized upgrades
  • Infinite looping with increasing difficulty
